cells.data:
# Url

Internal use only, unique.

field | notes
----- | -----
_id | bson ID
address | text, no limit, any protocol
hash | Unique MD5 hash based on the url


# Link

Is always private to each user.

field | notes
----- | -----
_id | bson ID
url_id | Reference to a Link
title | Optional text to describe the link
note | Personal note about the link
tags | List of tags as an array of strings
is_fav | bool


# Member

field | notes
----- | -----
_id | bson ID
user_id | bson ID
role | Role of the user: Reader, Collaborator, Owner


# Collection

Is public by default. Paid accounts can chose to make them private or invite others to view it.

field | notes
----- | -----
_id | bson ID
title | Title of the collection
description | Free text with markdown support
links | Collection of CollectionLinks
members | Collection of members
is_public | bool
